DOC.brief_summary: This study is a randomized, controlled, multiple risk intervention pilot study evaluated with clients recruited from VA Medical Center Substance Abuse Programs. The intervention combines an innovative online system with interpersonal MI-based coaching delivered in 4 sessions over 12-months time.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria are: at least 18 years of age, enrolled in the San Francisco Veteran Affairs Medical Center (SF VAMC) Substance Abuse Programs, residing in the San Francisco Bay Area and not planning to relocate out of the area in the next 18 months. For patients in the Day Hospital, we will wait until they have completed one week of treatment before approaching for study involvement, as the first week is the most intensive for services. Exclusion criteria are: unstable psychiatric disorder and severe cognitive impairment.
